DocLocalization.Name: Angabe zu Autor und Zeit des letzten Objektzugriffs

DocAttribute.Name: OwningUser
DocAttribute.Documentation: Direct reference to the end user who currently "owns" this object. Note that IFC includes the concept of ownership transfer from one user to another and therefore distinguishes between the Owning User and Creating User.

DocAttribute.Name: OwningApplication
DocAttribute.Documentation: Direct reference to the application which currently "owns" this object on behalf of the owning user of the application. Note that IFC includes the concept of ownership transfer from one application to another and therefore distinguishes between the Owning Application and Creating Application.

DocAttribute.Name: State
DocAttribute.Documentation: Enumeration that defines the current access state of the object.

DocAttribute.Name: ChangeAction
DocAttribute.Documentation: Enumeration that defines the actions associated with changes made to the object.

DocAttribute.Name: LastModifiedDate
DocAttribute.Documentation: Date and Time expressed in UTC (Universal Time Coordinated, formerly Greenwich Mean Time or GMT) at which the last modification was made by LastModifyingUser and LastModifyingApplication.

DocAttribute.Name: LastModifyingUser
DocAttribute.Documentation: User who carried out the last modification using LastModifyingApplication.

DocAttribute.Name: LastModifyingApplication
DocAttribute.Documentation: Application used to make the last modification.

DocAttribute.Name: CreationDate
DocAttribute.Documentation: The date and time expressed in UTC (Universal Time Coordinated, formerly Greenwich Mean Time or GMT) when first created by the original OwningApplication. Once defined this value remains unchanged through the lifetime of the entity.

DocWhereRule.Name: CorrectChangeAction
DocWhereRule.Documentation: If ChangeAction is asserted and LastModifiedDate is not defined, ChangeAction must be set to NOTDEFINED
DocWhereRule.Expression: (EXISTS(LastModifiedDate)) OR (NOT(EXISTS(LastModifiedDate)) AND NOT(EXISTS(ChangeAction))) OR (NOT(EXISTS(LastModifiedDate)) AND EXISTS(ChangeAction) AND ((ChangeAction = IfcChangeActionEnum.NOTDEFINED) OR (ChangeAction = IfcChangeActionEnum.NOCHANGE)))
